summary: An ordinance approving modification of the urban renewal plans in the Northwest Leschi project and the South Leschi Action Area project (N.D.P. No. Wash. A-2-1), the South Park Action Area project (No. Wash. A-2-2), and the North Greenwood Action Area project (No. Wash. A-2-3) by adding new and revised property rehabilitation standards, and by adding certain provisions relating to rehabilitation loans.
